# suggestedItems

**Instance Property**

An array of drag items that the system provides when the text drag delegate doesn’t provide custom drag items.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var suggestedItems: [UIDragItem] { get }
```

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextDragRequest/suggestedItems] property is always an empty array if the text drag delegate doesn’t implement the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextDragDelegate/textDraggableView(_:itemsForDrag:)] method.

## Getting the drag items

- **existingItems**: The array of drag items present in a drag session.

items.description: The array of drag items present in a drag session.
